data.title: 2008 Electoral College Results
data.meta_description: President Barack Obama [D]  Main Opponent John McCain [R]  Electoral Vote Winner: 365 Main Opponent: 173 Total/Majority: 538/270  Vice President Joe Biden (365)  V.P. Opponent: Sarah Palin (173)  Notes: Nebraska distributes its electoral votes proportionally, with two at-large electors representing the statewide winning presidential and vice presidential candidates and one
data.text:
...a Process, not a Place

The Office of the Federal Register (OFR) is a part of the National Archives and Records Administration (NARA) and, on behalf of the Archivist of the United States, coordinates certain functions of the Electoral College between the States and Congress. It has no role in appointing electors and has no contact with them.
